contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=April 2011}} '''Gabriele Alexandra Lesser''' (born May 16, 1960) in Frankfurt/Main is a [[historian]]<ref name="Müller2009">{{cite journal|last=Müller|first=Jan-Werner|year=2009|title=Just another Vergangenheitsbewältigung? The Process of Coming to Terms with the East German Past Revisited|journal=Oxford German Studies|volume=38|issue=3|pages=334–344|issn=00787191|doi=10.1179/007871909x475634|quote=For a summary of mocking, yet ultimately positive, perspectives, see Gabriele Lesser, 'Bewältigung nach DIN-Norm', ....}}</ref> and [[journalist]],<ref name="HedegaardLindstrom2000">{{cite book|last1=Hedegaard|first1=Lars|last2=Lindstrom|first2=B|title=The Nebi Yearbook 1999: North European and Baltic Sea Integration|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=TuhvUlkmtJ8C&pg=PA158|accessdate=10 April 2011|date=2000-01-07|publisher=Springer|isbn=978-3-540-66407-9|page=158}}</ref><ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.bloomberg.com/apps/news?pid=newsarchive&sid=atbwCbmXwyUo&refer=germany|title=Polish Government Condemns `Vulgar' German Newspaper Article|last=Andrusz -|first=Katya|date=5 July 2006|work=[[Bloomberg L.P.|Bloomberg]]|accessdate=10 April 2011}}</ref> who specializes in the history of [[World War II]] and the [[occupation of Poland]], the [[Baltic Republics]], and [[Ukraine]] 1939-1945. As [[Warsaw]]-based correspondent of newspapers published in [[Germany]] (Taz-Berlin), [[Austria]] (Standard-Vienna), and [[Switzerland]] (Tages-Anzeiger-Zurich) she publishes regularly news, reportages, analysis about Poland, Ukraine, the Baltic Republics and the oblast [[Kaliningrad]]. She wrote and edited several books about the contemporary Poland, the history of the [[Education in Poland during World War II|Underground University]] in [[Kraków|Cracow]] in World War II and a guidebook about [[Masuria]] and the [[Masurian Lakeland]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Authority control|VIAF=59720390}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Lesser, Gabriele Alexandra | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = May 16, 1960 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lesser, Gabriele Alexandra}} [[Category:1960 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:German historians]] [[Category:German journalists]]
